item.title: Debug xv6 with gdb
item.description: Preparation # # Run xv6 with gdb make qemu-gdb # Change to another terminal and connect to xv6-gdb gdb-multiarch -x .gdbinit Basic Command # # Set break point b syscall b module.c:67 # Continue c # Step into step # Step over next # List value of register info register # List args info args # See who call it backtrace # Set value set xxx # Watching variable watch a

item.title: Implement isatty on xv6
item.description: I desire to fix the bug that it prints a $ when processing shell commands from a file.

item.title: Implement pwd on xv6
item.description: pwd will print working directory. Here we will implement pwd on xv6.
